definition: a wild and exciting undertaking that may involve an element of danger or trouble, to take a risk in the hope of a favorable outcome
details:
noun
- a wild and exciting undertaking that may involve an element of danger or trouble
= example: a wild and exciting undertaking that may involve an element of danger or trouble
= synonyms: escapade
verb
- to take a risk in the hope of a favorable outcome
= example: to take a risk in the hope of a favorable outcome
= synonyms: gamble, risk, chance, hazard, take chances, run a risk, take a chance
- to put at risk
= example: to put at risk
= synonyms: venture, hazard, stake, jeopardise, jeopardize
